channel.title: Just reformated my Computor and client doesnt work
channel.description: Hi guys I just reformated my comp yesterday and installed jdk 6_21 and My 508 server starts up but my client cant get past connection to update server and give me the error [error_game_js5connect] this did not happen before the formate whats wrong with it?

item.title: Just reformated my Computor and client doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @samoankilla samoankilla
item.description:
@samoankilla wrote:

No Reformattiong his computer mustve reset his Path and Classpath. Please set those and you should be good to go

Read full topic
item.source: Just reformated my Computor and client doesnt work

item.title: Just reformated my Computor and client doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

check your ports and ips

open up command prompt and type ipconfig make sure your ip for router didnt change if it did reforward your ports to new ip.
if you are using no-ip.org make sure to reinstall if you havent already and refresh its readings.

Formatting his computer shouldn’t reset his router/internet connection.
Though he might need No-Ip.DUC, I wouldn’t know as I don’t need it.

[shadow=red,left]----------------------------------------------------[/shadow]

If your error is:

The system cannot find the path specified

You may want to download this to fix your problems.

Also, the one thing you could’ve done is not installed Java JDK.
I hope that you could not forget to download JDK…

Read full topic
